thread.title: Burnley striker Andre Gray surprises Little Mix girlfriend Leigh-Anne Pinnock on US tour
thread.title_full: Burnley striker Andre Gray surprises Little Mix girlfriend Leigh-Anne Pinnock on US tour

author: Alex Smith
title: Burnley striker Andre Gray surprises Little Mix girlfriend Leigh-Anne Pinnock on US tour
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Romantic Burnley striker Andre Gray has taken the opportunity from the international break to surprise his pop star girlfriend in the US. 
Gray is dating Little Mix member Leigh-Anne Pinnock and decided to fly out to the States to elevate the boredom of the domestic lock down. 
The "Shoutout To My Ex" singers have been on tour in the US supporting diva Ariana Granade and Gray jumped in to make a shock stop in Seattle. 
The striker broke into the group's dressing room before hugging his beau from behind, with Leigh-Anne taking a moment to realise who it was. Gray gives it some heart (Photo: Getty) Little Mix, with Leigh-Anne the second from the left (Photo: Daily Mirror) Instagram 
She then leaps up in disbelief before jumping into his arms to start a long embrace. 
Leigh-Anne posted a clip on Instagram with the caption: "So 3 days ago this happened. I was so down, being away from home for so long and all I wanted was one of his cuddles. 
"This surprise was more than I could have ever asked for. Completely in shock and over whelmed to finally see him again after so long. 
"I absolutely adore this boy with everything I have in me. I'll never be able to put it into words. I love you so much. Hardest thing was saying bye again." Leigh-Anne in action (Photo: Getty Images) Gray during his day job (Photo: REUTERS) 
It isn't the first time the pair have cooed over each other at a music event during their nine month whirlwind romance- after Gray supported Leigh-Anne at the Brit Awards. 
The Clarets hit man celebrated Little Mix picking up their awards along with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, who is going out with Perrie Edwards. 
Gray is in his debut Premier League season - but is closing in on double figures after netting eight times in 23 appearances. Like us on Facebook
